description: This is a simple dashboard for banzaicloud/logging-operator and OpenSearch operator

targets.expr: sum by (clusterName)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", resource="cpu"}) / sum by (clusterName)(kube_node_status_allocatable{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", resource="cpu"})

sum by (clusterName)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", resource="cpu"}) / sum by (clusterName)(kube_node_status_allocatable{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", resource="cpu"})

title: Logging Health
